trans-unit.source: Defines an MSBuild task that creates the sections of an application manifest for an Office document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个 MSBuild 任务，该任务针对 Office 文档级自定义创建应用程序清单部分。

trans-unit.source: Set all the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeDocumentManifest> properties, and then call <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeDocumentManifest.Execute%2A> to run this task.
trans-unit.target: 设置所有<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeDocumentManifest>属性，，然后调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeDocumentManifest.Execute%2A>若要运行此任务。

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Build Engine uses <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks> to build and deploy Office solutions.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Build Engine 使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks>生成和部署 Office 解决方案。

trans-unit.source: However, you can create your own build system by using these classes and the MSBuild XML-based project files.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可以使用这些类并基于 MSBuild XML 项目文件来创建你自己生成系统。
有关详细信息，请参阅[MSBuild 参考](~/msbuild/msbuild-reference.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeDocumentManifest" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeDocumentManifest" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates the application manifest for an Office document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 针对 Office 文档级自定义创建应用程序清单。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the application manifest for the document-level customization was generated successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功生成文档级自定义的应用程序清单，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML of the sections of an application manifest for an Office document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Office 文档级自定义的应用程序清单部分的 XML。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" /> that contains the XML of the Office solutions in Visual Studio sections of an application manifest for a document-level customization.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" />包含的文档级自定义的应用程序清单的 Visual Studio 部分中的 Office 解决方案的 XML。

trans-unit.source: Sets the GUID that the Visual Studio Tools for Office runtime uses to identify the solution.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Visual Studio Tools for Office 运行时用于标识解决方案的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the GUID of the Office solution.
trans-unit.target: 包含的 Office 解决方案的 GUID 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: You can set the GUID that the Visual Studio Tools for Office runtime uses to identify the solution.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置 Visual Studio Tools for Office 运行时用于标识解决方案的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeDocumentManifest.SolutionID%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeDocumentManifest.Execute%2A> is called.
